rows.name: Clasp of Energy Protection (Acid, Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Grants resistance 10 vs acid (shield bearer). Becomes inert after preventing 50 damage (resets daily).

rows.name: Clasp of Energy Protection (Acid, Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Grants resistance 15 vs acid (shield bearer). Becomes inert after preventing 75 damage (resets daily).

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Armor (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of attached armor or shield by +2.

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Armor (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of attached armor or shield by +5.

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Armor (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of attached armor or shield by +10.

rows.name: Crystal of Adaptation (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Protects from temperature extremes (as endure elements).

rows.name: Crystal of Adaptation (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; also protected from all alignment traits of any plane (DMG 149).

rows.name: Crystal of Adaptation (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; also protected from positive- and negative-dominant planar traits (DMG 149).

rows.name: Crystal of Aquatic Action (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Armor imposes no armor check penalty on your Swim checks.

rows.name: Crystal of Aquatic Action (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; also gain a Swim speed equal to 1/2 your land speed (round down to nearest 5 ft).

rows.name: Crystal of Aquatic Action (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; also no penalties on attacks or movement underwater (as freedom of movement) and you can breathe water as easily as air.

rows.name: Crystal of Arrow Deflection (Least)
rows.effects_summary: +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

rows.name: Crystal of Arrow Deflection (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: +5 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

rows.name: Crystal of Arrow Deflection (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: +10 bonus to AC against ranged attacks; also deflect one ranged attack per round as if with Deflect Arrows feat.

rows.name: Crystal of Bent Sight
rows.effects_summary: You can avert your eyes against gaze attacks without incurring the normal miss chance on your attacks against that creature.

rows.name: Crystal of Glancing Blows (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Grants +2 competence bonus on grapple checks to prevent a grapple from being initiated (not on other grapple checks).

rows.name: Crystal of Glancing Blows (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; bonus is +5 on grapple checks to prevent a grapple from being initiated.

rows.name: Crystal of Glancing Blows (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As least; bonus is +10 on grapple checks to prevent a grapple from being initiated.

rows.name: Crystal of Lifekeeping (Least)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs listed effects
rows.effects_summary: +1 competence bonus on saves vs energy drain, inflict spells, death spells, and death effects.

rows.name: Crystal of Lifekeeping (Lesser)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs listed effects
rows.effects_summary: +3 competence bonus on saves vs energy drain, inflict spells, death spells, and death effects.

rows.name: Crystal of Lifekeeping (Greater)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs listed effects
rows.effects_summary: +5 competence bonus on saves vs energy drain, inflict spells, death spells, and death effects; 1/day immediate mental action to reroll a failed save vs any of these effects.

rows.name: Crystal of Mind Cloaking (Least)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs mind‑affecting
rows.effects_summary: +1 competence bonus on saves vs mind‑affecting spells and abilities.

rows.name: Crystal of Mind Cloaking (Lesser)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs mind‑affecting
rows.effects_summary: +3 competence bonus on saves vs mind‑affecting spells and abilities.

rows.name: Crystal of Mind Cloaking (Greater)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs mind‑affecting
rows.effects_summary: +5 competence bonus on saves vs mind‑affecting; 1/day immediate mental action to reroll a failed save vs a mind‑affecting effect.

rows.name: Crystal of Screening (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Imposes –2 penalty on touch attacks against you made by incorporeal creatures.

rows.name: Crystal of Screening (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Imposes –5 penalty on touch attacks against you made by incorporeal creatures.

rows.name: Crystal of Screening (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Imposes –10 penalty on touch attacks against you made by incorporeal creatures.

rows.name: Crystal of Stamina (Least)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs poison/disease
rows.effects_summary: +1 competence bonus on saves vs disease and poison.

rows.name: Crystal of Stamina (Lesser)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs poison/disease
rows.effects_summary: +3 competence bonus on saves vs disease and poison.

rows.name: Crystal of Stamina (Greater)
rows.activation: —; greater: immediate mental action reroll 1/day on failed save vs poison/disease
rows.effects_summary: +5 competence bonus on saves vs disease and poison; 1/day immediate mental action to reroll a failed save vs poison or disease.

rows.name: Iron Ward Diamond (Least)
rows.effects_summary: DR 1/— until 10 damage prevented (then inert until next day). Stacks with similar DR sources.

rows.name: Iron Ward Diamond (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: DR 3/— until 30 damage prevented (then inert). Functions only when attached to medium or heavy armor.

rows.name: Iron Ward Diamond (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: DR 5/— until 50 damage prevented (then inert). Functions only when attached to heavy armor.

rows.name: Restful Crystal
rows.effects_summary: Sleeping in armor with this crystal does not make you fatigued.

rows.name: Rubicund Frenzy (Least)
rows.effects_summary: While at or below 1/2 maximum hit points, gain +1 morale bonus on weapon damage rolls and saves vs fear (living creatures only).

rows.name: Rubicund Frenzy (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but bonus is +3.

rows.name: Rubicund Frenzy (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but bonus is +5.

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Weaponry (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of the attached weapon by +2.

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Weaponry (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of the attached weapon by +5.

rows.name: Crystal of Adamant Weaponry (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Improves hardness of the attached weapon by +10.

rows.name: Crystal of Arcane Steel (Least)
rows.effects_summary: +1 insight bonus on the weapon's damage roll when delivering a spell or spell-like ability through a melee attack.

rows.name: Crystal of Arcane Steel (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least, and you also gain a +1 insight bonus on the attack roll when delivering a spell or spell-like ability through a melee attack.

rows.name: Crystal of Arcane Steel (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser, and the save DC of the delivered spell or spell-like ability increases by 1.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Acid, Least)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1 acid damage to the weapon's damage; does not stack with existing acid damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Acid, Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 acid damage; does not stack with existing acid damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Acid, Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 acid damage; on a hit, target takes –1 AC for 1 round (non-stacking).

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Cold, Least)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1 cold damage; does not stack with existing cold damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Cold, Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 cold damage; does not stack with existing cold damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Cold, Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 cold damage; on a hit, target's speed –10 ft. for 1 round (min 5 ft.; non-stacking).

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Electricity, Least)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1 electricity damage; does not stack with existing electricity damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Electricity, Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 electricity damage; does not stack with existing electricity damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Electricity, Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 electricity damage; on a hit, target is dazzled for 1 round.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Fire, Least)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1 fire damage; does not stack with existing fire damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Fire, Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 fire damage; does not stack with existing fire damage on the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Energy Assault (Fire, Greater)
rows.effects_summary: Adds +1d6 fire damage; target takes an additional +1d6 fire damage 1 round later (non-stacking per target).

rows.name: Crystal of Illumination (Least)
rows.effects_summary: On activation the weapon sheds bright light in a 5-ft. radius (shadowy for 5 ft. beyond).

rows.name: Crystal of Illumination (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: On activation the weapon sheds bright light in a 20-ft. radius (shadowy for 20 ft. beyond).

rows.name: Crystal of Illumination (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: On activation the weapon sheds bright light in a 60-ft. radius (shadowy for 60 ft. beyond).

rows.name: Crystal of Life Drinking (Least)
rows.effects_summary: When you deal damage to a living creature with this weapon, you heal 1 hp (nonlethal damage doesn't trigger). Becomes inert after healing 10 hp until the next day.

rows.name: Crystal of Life Drinking (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but heal 3 hp per hit until 30 hp have been healed (then inert until next day).

rows.name: Crystal of Life Drinking (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but heal 5 hp per hit until 50 hp have been healed (then inert until next day).

rows.name: Crystal of Return (Least)
rows.effects_summary: You can draw the attached weapon as a free action.

rows.name: Crystal of Return (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least, and you can call the unattended weapon to your hand from up to 30 ft. as a move action.

rows.name: Crystal of Return (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser, and if the weapon is designed to be thrown it also gains the returning property.

rows.name: Crystal of Security (Least)
rows.effects_summary: +2 bonus on checks to draw/retain the weapon (e.g., opposed disarm or contested grabs).

rows.name: Crystal of Security (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: +5 bonus on checks to draw/retain the weapon.

rows.name: Crystal of Security (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: +10 bonus on checks to draw/retain the weapon.

rows.name: Demolition Crystal (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Weapon deals +1d6 damage vs constructs.

rows.name: Demolition Crystal (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; weapon counts as adamantine for overcoming constructs' DR.

rows.name: Demolition Crystal (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; weapon can deliver sneak attacks and critical hits against constructs as if they were living.

rows.name: Fiendslayer Crystal (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Weapon deals +1d6 damage to evil outsiders.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; good alignment

rows.name: Fiendslayer Crystal (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; weapon is treated as good-aligned for overcoming DR.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; good alignment

rows.name: Fiendslayer Crystal (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; on a critical hit vs an evil outsider, it cannot use teleportation for 1 round. Any evil creature wielding the weapon gains 1 negative level while it holds it (cannot be removed while wielded).
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; good alignment

rows.name: Phoenix Ash Threat (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Each target hit by the weapon takes 1 fire damage at the start of your next turn (not cumulative per target).

rows.name: Phoenix Ash Threat (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but 3 fire damage at the start of your next turn (not cumulative per target).

rows.name: Phoenix Ash Threat (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As least, but 5 fire damage at the start of your next turn (not cumulative per target).

rows.name: Revelation Crystal (Least)
rows.effects_summary: When you damage an invisible creature, it glows like a torch for 1 round, revealing its squares and movement (50% miss chance still applies).

rows.name: Revelation Crystal (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; invisibility effects on the damaged creature are suppressed for 1 round (including natural or extraordinary).

rows.name: Revelation Crystal (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; also suppresses concealment effects (e.g., blur, displacement) on the damaged creature for 1 round (not environmental concealment).

rows.name: Truedeath Crystal (Least)
rows.effects_summary: Weapon deals +1d6 damage to undead.

rows.name: Truedeath Crystal (Lesser)
rows.effects_summary: As least; weapon also functions as a ghost touch weapon.

rows.name: Truedeath Crystal (Greater)
rows.effects_summary: As lesser; weapon can deliver sneak attacks and critical hits against undead as if they were living.

rows.name: Witchlight Reservoir
rows.effects_summary: Holds 5 charges of stored power after 8 hours' exposure to sunlight, moonlight, blood, or wine (new exposure replaces the effect). On activation, the next melee hit this turn gains: Sunlight +2d6 fire (or +4d6 vs undead); Moonlight +2d6 electricity (or +4d6 vs lycanthropes); Blood +2d6 damage vs living; Wine target –2 Will saves for 1 round. After 5 uses it must be imbued again.
